name: Naughty Ball - Happy Jump
description:
To get the flowers at the top, the brave little ball needs to overcome the difficulties and obstacles all the way by jumping up and up!
Simple Gameplay: by tapping the screen, the ball will jump up 1 floor.
Exciting Experience: Moving ladders, shuttle gears, burning fire line and Piranha which will rush out at any time......
Fresh New Experience: Huge ball family, waiting for you to unlock and change.
